thread.title: FBI Director Comey: ‘We Are Not on Anybody’s Side’
thread.title_full: FBI Director Comey: ‘We Are Not on Anybody’s Side’

author: Josh Feldman
title: FBI Director Comey: ‘We Are Not on Anybody’s Side’

organizations.name: intelligence and national security alliance leadership dinner

text:
FBI Director Comey: ‘We Are Not on Anybody’s Side’ by Josh Feldman | 10:39 pm, March 29th, 2017 
FBI Director James Comey spoke at the Intelligence and National Security Alliance Leadership Dinner earlier this evening and he did some reflecting on the past year. 
“I’ve never been prouder of the FBI,” he said. “What makes it easy is we’re not on anybody’s side ever. We’re not considering whose ox’ll be gored by this action or that action… We just don’t care, and we can’t care.” 
Comey spoke of the “hyper-partisan environment” in America right now and made mention of his recent testimony to members of Congress, saying that “they see facts as to how it will affect ‘my side.'” 
After CNN played that clip tonight, Jeffrey Toobin reacted by saying, “What a bunch of sanctimonious nonsense.” 
You can watch the clip above, via CNN. 
[ image via screengrab ]
